item.tricksy.sage_hat.tooltip: Use on a suitable mob to apprentice them
item.tricksy.prescient_note.tooltip: Sneak + Right-click to add a value
item.tricksy.prescient_note.tooltip_craf: Use in a crafting window to add a value
item.tricksy.prescient_note.tooltip_clea: Sneak + Right-click the air to reset
item.tricksy.prescient_note.tooltip_cycl: Sneak + Right-click in inventory to change type
item.tricksy.scripture.tooltip_copy: Right-click on a mob to copy their behaviour
item.tricksy.scripture.tooltip_paste: Sneak + Right-click on a mob to paste this behaviour
node.tricksy.control_flow.desc: Control Flow nodes determine how updates move through the tree
node.tricksy.decorator.desc: Decorator nodes either alter the outcome of child nodes or repeat them
node.tricksy.condition.desc: Condition nodes only return success or failure, depending on their requirements
node.tricksy.leaf.desc: Leaf nodes cause the mob to take action in some way
node.tricksy.dummy.desc: If you're seeing this, the tree's NBT data is messed up
variant.tricksy.selector.desc: Calls the first viable child node until it reaches an end state
variant.tricksy.sequence.desc: Calls each child node in order until one fails or all succeed
variant.tricksy.reactive.desc: Calls all child nodes until either any fail or all succeed
variant.tricksy.inverter.desc: Returns the opposite result to its child node
variant.tricksy.delay.desc: Calls the child node after a delay measured in seconds
variant.tricksy.force_failure.desc: Returns only failure, like your student loans
variant.tricksy.repeat.desc: Repeats the child node N times or until it fails
variant.tricksy.retry.desc: Repeats the child N times or until it succeeds
variant.tricksy.for_each.desc: Repeats the child for each entry in a list, cycling it
variant.tricksy.do_once.desc: Fires only once each time the tree is loaded
variant.tricksy.value_true.desc: Returns success if the yes/no equivalent of the value is Yes
variant.tricksy.value_exists.desc: Returns success if the value exists
variant.tricksy.value_equals.desc: Returns success if both values are identical
variant.tricksy.closer_than.desc: Returns success if the distance between two points is less than a certain range
variant.tricksy.less_than.desc: Returns success if value A is numerically lower than value B
variant.tricksy.inv_has.desc: Returns success if the container has any matching items
variant.tricksy.on_fire.desc: Returns success if the entity is on fire
variant.tricksy.block_powered.desc: Returns success if the specified block is powered by redstone
variant.tricksy.cycle_value.desc: Cycles the list value, moving its current value to the bottom of the list
variant.tricksy.set_value.desc: Copies a value to a whiteboard entry
variant.tricksy.drop_item.desc: Drops whatever item is currently held in the main hand
variant.tricksy.swap_items.desc: Swaps the item in the left hand with the item in the right, and vice-versa
variant.tricksy.sleep.desc: Falls asleep, recovering health over time unless disturbed
variant.tricksy.insert_item.desc: Attempts to insert the mainhand held item into an inventory
variant.tricksy.extract_item.desc: Attempts to extract 1 item from an inventory to the main hand
variant.tricksy.wait.desc: Performs no action for a number of seconds
variant.tricksy.set_attack.desc: Sets or clears the current attack target
variant.tricksy.set_home.desc: Sets or clears the current home position
variant.tricksy.sort_nearest.desc: Sorts a list by distance to a point
variant.tricksy.nearest_item.desc: Finds and stores the nearest item
variant.tricksy.pick_up.desc: Picks up an item with the mainhand
variant.tricksy.melee_attack.desc: Attacks an entity using the mainhand item
variant.tricksy.bow_attack.desc: Attacks an entity using a bow
variant.tricksy.crossbow_attack.desc: Attacks an entity using a crossbow
variant.tricksy.trident_attack.desc: Attacks an entity using a trident
variant.tricksy.potion_attack.desc: Attacks an entity using a splash potion
variant.tricksy.nearest_creature.desc: Finds and stores a nearby creature
variant.tricksy.get_assailant.desc: Finds and stores a recent assailant
variant.tricksy.get_health.desc: Gets the current health of the entity
variant.tricksy.get_held_item.desc: Gets the item the entity is holding
variant.tricksy.use_item.desc: Starts/stops using the mainhand item continuously
variant.tricksy.use_item_on.desc: Uses the mainhand item on a block or entity
variant.tricksy.get_distance.desc: Gets the distance between two points
variant.tricksy.get_bark.desc: Gets the mob's most recent mark
variant.tricksy.distance_to.desc: Gets the distance between two points
variant.tricksy.break_block.desc: Uses the mainhand item to break the block
variant.tricksy.addition.desc: Adds or subtracts one number from another
variant.tricksy.offset.desc: Moves a position one step in a given direction
variant.tricksy.can_mine.desc: Returns success if the item can mine the block successfully
variant.tricksy.is_item.desc: Returns success if the item matches the filter
variant.tricksy.is_type.desc: Returns success if the creature matches the filter
variant.tricksy.get_creatures.desc: Finds and stores all matching nearby creatures
variant.tricksy.get_items.desc: Finds and stores all matching nearby items
variant.tricksy.nearest_inventory.desc: Finds and stores the nearest inventory
variant.tricksy.get_inventories.desc: Finds and stores all nearby inventories
variant.tricksy.shield_against.desc: Raises a shield against a target
variant.tricksy.look_at.desc: Looks at a creature or position
item.tricksy.sage_hat.master_set: %s will now follow the ways of this sage
item.tricksy.prescient_note.give_value.g: Value added to the sage's whiteboard
